articles.author: Nika Shakhnazarova
articles.title: Kelly Clarkson admits to using weight loss drug after losing 60 pounds - New York Post
articles.description: While the “American Idol” alum didn’t disclose the name of the weight loss drug she’s been taking, she insisted it was not Ozempic.
articles.content:
Kelly Clarkson has credited a weight loss drug for her slimmed-down frame.
While chatting with Whoopi Goldberg, who recently lost weight with the help of the Type II diabetes weight loss drug Mounja… [+2417 chars]

articles.title: UK mining giant Anglo American to offload De Beers diamond firm - BBC.com
articles.description: The announcement comes after Anglo American rejected a £34bn takeover bid from rival BHP.

articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Blinken makes unannounced visit to Ukraine to show US support for Kyiv as Russian attacks intensify - The Times of India
articles.description: US News: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken paid an unexpected visit to Kyiv on Tuesday to reaffirm American support for Ukraine as it grapples with heighten
